content: ओघः [उच्-घञ् पृषो° घ] {@--1@} A flood, stream, current; पुनरोधेन हि युज्यते नदी <ls>Ku. 4. 44</ls>; so रुधिर°, बाष्प° &c. {@--2@} An inundation. {@--3@} A heap, quantity, mass, multitude; बाण°, अघ°, जन° &c. {@--4@} The whole. {@--5@} Continuity. {@--6@} Quick time in music. {@--7@} Tradition, traditional instruction. {@--8@} A kind of dance.
